document.full_text: vertex pharmaceuticals inc's highly anticipated hepatitis c drug won u.s. approval, promising far higher cure rates for the liver-destroying disease and setting up a head-to-head marketing battle with a rival new medicine from merck & co.
document.title: vertex hepatitis c drug ok'd, promising more cures
lines_and_colors: vertex pharmaceuticals inc's highly anticipated hepatitis c drug won u.s. approval, promising far higher cure rates for the liver-destroying disease and setting up a head-to-head marketing battle with a rival new medicine from merck & co.
